```{r}
library(rvest)
library(polite)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
url_links <-'https://www.imdb.com/chart/toptv/?ref_=nv_tvv_250'
webpage<- read_html(url_links)
```

```{r}
request <-bow(url_links,
              user_agent = "educational")
request
session_request<-scrape(request)
```

```{r}
rank_title <- character(0)
links <- character(0)
title_list <- scrape(request) %>%
  html_nodes('h3.ipc-title__text') %>%
  html_text
```

```{r}
class(title_list)
title_list_sub <- as.data.frame(title_list[2:51])
head(title_list_sub)
tail(title_list_sub)

```

```{r}
colnames(title_list_sub) <- 'ranks'
title_list_sub
```

```{r}
split_df <- strsplit(as.character(title_list_sub$ranks),".",fixed = TRUE)
split_df <- data.frame(do.call(rbind,split_df))
colnames(split_df) <- c("Ranks","Title")
```
```{r}
str(split_df)
class(split_df)
head(split_df)
rank_title <- data.frame(
  rank_title = split_df)
write.csv(rank_title,file = "title.csv")
```
